name: Xmas Shooting - Scramble!!
description: Help Aru save Christmas in this humoristic, action-packed shooter set in the universe of QP Shooting - Dangerous!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel CPU 2.0GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 or above compatible card with 512MB VRAM or more (Radeon or GeForce recommended) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible card
